argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | estrccat.c | |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | estrcid.o | |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) |
| 3 |  | estrcid.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 4 |  | estrcid.x | |- ( ph -> X e. U ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_estrccatid | |- ( U e. V -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. U |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. U |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. U |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> .1. = ( x e. U |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( Base ` x ) = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_reseq2d | |- ( x = X -> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ x = X ) -> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` X ) e. _V |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` X ) e. _V ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_resiexd | |- ( ph -> ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) e. _V ) |
| 15 | 8, 11, 4, 14 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
